prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If candidates are provided, you MUST choose one of them (even if it slightly overshoots quantity) and justify the pick—never return null when at least one candidate exists.
        Only when no candidates are supplied may you set `selected_product_id` to null, and those notes must begin with `MISSING_SKU:` so the pipeline can flag the meal for removal.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FAM_MEZZE_30to60",
  "name": "Family Middle Eastern & Greek Mezze Nights",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "MiddleEastern",
      "Greek",
      "Turkish"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Intermediate"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Medium"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Sheet-Pan Shawarma Chicken with Lemon Rice and Mint Yogurt",
  "description": "Family-style shawarma chicken and peppers roasted on a tray, served with lemon basmati rice and a quick mint yogurt. Build plates with warm pita and a sprinkle of sumac.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat oven to 220°C/425°F.",
    "Rinse 1 1/2 cups basmati rice until water runs clear; drain.",
    "Slice 700–800 g chicken thigh fillets into strips.",
    "Slice 2 bell peppers into strips and 1 red onion into wedges.",
    "Finely chop 2 cloves garlic and a small handful of mint.",
    "Zest and juice 1 lemon; keep separate.",
    "Grate 1/2 cucumber on large holes; squeeze out excess liquid.",
    "Warm pita bread in packaging or cover to keep ready."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "On a large tray, toss chicken thigh fillets, bell peppers, and red onion with olive oil, shawarma paste, half the lemon juice, sea salt, and black pepper. Spread in a single layer.",
    "Roast on the middle rack for 20–25 minutes, stirring once, until chicken is cooked through and edges are browned.",
    "While the tray roasts, add basmati rice to a saucepan with 2 1/4 cups water, a pinch of sea salt, and a drizzle of olive oil. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer on low 12 minutes. Remove from heat and rest 5 minutes, covered.",
    "In a bowl, mix yogurt, grated cucumber, chopped mint, garlic, remaining lemon juice, and a pinch of sea salt and black pepper to make mint yogurt.",
    "Fluff rice with a fork; stir in lemon zest and a little olive oil. Adjust sea salt to taste.",
    "Warm pita bread in the oven for 2–3 minutes during the last minutes of roasting.",
    "To serve: spoon lemon rice onto plates, top with shawarma chicken and vegetables, dollop mint yogurt, and finish with a sprinkle of sumac. Serve pita on the side."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken thigh fillets",
      "quantity": "700–800 g",
      "preparation": "sliced into strips"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bell peppers",
      "quantity": "2 medium",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "red onion",
      "quantity": "1 large",
      "preparation": "cut into wedges"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "shawarma paste",
      "quantity": "2–3 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "3–4 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "divided"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "zest and juice separated"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sea salt",
      "quantity": "1–1 1/2 teaspoons",
      "preparation": "divided, to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "1/2 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "basmati rice",
      "quantity": "1 1/2 cups",
      "preparation": "rinsed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "yogurt",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "plain"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cucumber",
      "quantity": "1/2 medium",
      "preparation": "grated and squeezed dry"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mint",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "2 cloves",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sumac",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "for finishing"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pita bread",
      "quantity": "4–6 rounds",
      "preparation": "warmed"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Greek",
      "MiddleEastern",
      "Turkish"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],

      "Intermediate"
    ],

    ],

    ],

    ],

    ]
  }
}
        ```
